entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Snow level 800 metres lowering to valley bottom this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Snow level 800 metres. High 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early in the evening then partly cloudy. Snow level 800 metres. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 25 March 2023
